io.micronaut.context.event

Class BeanPreDestroyEvent<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • io.micronaut.context.event.ApplicationEvent
        • io.micronaut.context.event.BeanContextEvent
          • io.micronaut.context.event.BeanEvent<T>
            • io.micronaut.context.event.BeanPreDestroyEvent<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The event type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BeanPreDestroyEvent<T>
extends BeanEvent<T>

    An event fired when a bean is about to be destroyed but before any PreDestroy methods are invoked..

    Since:
    3.0.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
    See Also:
    BeanDestroyedEvent, Serialized Form
